verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker] praline sweet potatoes i had a house full of relatives and was short on cooking space i used the basic idea of the traditional sweet potato casserole and adapted it for the slow cooker it been a huge hit ever since —joanna stanforth scott air force base illinois
